title: Advanced Embodied Design and Visual Cue Utilization Strategies for VR-Based Musical Instrument Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device utilization skills and foundational music theory knowledge
context.additional_context: Creative Language Learning for Leadership Stress Management

learning_goals: Perform yanggeum playing fundamentals with 80% accuracy using high/low embodiment design and visual cues in a VR environment

Reduce perceived cognitive load by 30% and improve educational efficiency by 25% during VR learning processes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
